drivers.name: lxx74
drivers.comments:
Enrique Pe'rez-Terro'n's experimental driver for the Lexmark X74 and X75 printers.

Appears to build as any of a ghostscript driver, a cups raster driver, or a filter program.

notes:
This is a multifunction device with integrated scanner/copier. Apparently the X75 is identical.

Scanning not known to work; see SANE project's database.

Consumables/Refills: color + black cartridge
